title: Here is a small glimpse into what top lane is most the time
body:
http://i.makeagif.com/media/4-13-2017/28QGCA.gif


{{champion:266}}: Up for a little dance party?

{{champion:3}}: Sure but first my jungler is coming this way...

{{champion:121}}: YOU B@?%!

replies.body:
{{champion:240}} 
["Whoops! Looks like I accidentally stabbed you with my long axe - until you were dead!"](https://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/1c/Kled.kill06.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20160729192153)
But... the badgers command their death...

So, so true.

In addition, I'm a simple girl. I see an ankama thing, I upvote.

Uh but rule 30.1 says that rule 30 only applies to the deep internet
Don't you worry. I know a joke when I see one, and while you joke was an oldie, it's one that's held up ;)
I have yet to check out this Ankama thing. I heard it was good but I'm super busy with paperwork, another good anime, and being a minor memelord.
The show and movies are great in my opinion the Mmo's are fun
I suggest trying out Wakfu. It has the Eliatrope, hands down teh best class in any mmo ever. Portal shenanigans for days, buddy!! And it's free! And you can be a pirate if you want!

Can always count on the junglers to ruin a perfectly fun lane.

I had one of those 1 or 2 seasons ago as Azir VS Veigar mid. Whole map burned around us, but we just kept the dance going.
Then out junglers decided we needed help to brake the mid dead-lock and camped lane. That should have been reportable. XD

(I think that Veigar is still on my friends list, actually.)
